question: Which of the following rulers built a Shiva temple at Gangaikondacholapuram and excavated a tank called Chodagarg?
explanation: To commemorate the victory over the Pala ruler, Mahipal I, and the Western Chalukyas, Rajendra I assumed the title of Gangaikondachola and established a new capital named Gangaikondacholapuram. He also built a Shiva temple here and excavated a tank called Chodagarg.
